title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, or chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama, packaged as a single Docker image.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama with fluent builder APIs; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints for scripting and automation.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that adds local AI completions via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama with ActiveRecord-style syntax.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with NuGet package.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB in 50 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that exposes Ollama models as Slack slash commands or DMs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit template for building quick web demos powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, go get github.com/ollama/ollama-go.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver extension that adds SQL query generation and explanation via local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
